encode_utils.tests.test_connection¶

Tests logic in the Connection class in the connection module.

class encode_utils.tests.test_connection.TestConnection(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Tests the connection.py module.

test_before_file_post()[source]¶

Tests the method before_file_post() for correctly setting the md5sum property of a file record.

test_get_lookup_ids_from_payload()[source]¶

Tests the method get_lookup_ids_from_payload() for returning the correct result.

test_extract_aws_upload_credentials()[source]¶

Tests the method extract_aws_upload_credentials() for extracting the upload credentials for from a file object’s JSON.

test_make_search_url()[source]¶

Tests the method make_search_url() for building the correct URL given the query arguments to find ChIP-seq assays performed on primary cells from blood.

test_2_make_search_url()[source]¶

Tests the method make_search_url() for building the correct URL given the query arguments to find ChIP-seq assays performed on primary cells from blood, and a limit of 1 search result.
